version_description: Bug fixes.

Added the ability to mail content from other apps with IBM Verse.
Bug fixes.
Addresses issue specific to MobileIron environments.
- Bug Fixes

- Improved font size consistency for email readability
- New pre-configuration parameters for improved MAM enforcement
- Bug Fixes
- Bug fix around password change

- New setting for loading remote images
- Support for authentication against on-premises instances of Microsoft Active Directory Federation Services (ADFS).
- Bug fixes

- New Mail Threading Experience
- Left and right swipe, and zoom options for individual messages
- 'Edit' button for multi-message actions
- Share Extension
- Users of this release will not see IBM Verse as an option from applic
Bug fixes.

- Fix crash when using with Touch ID
- Improved Inbox scrolling performance
- Bug fixes

- Option to sync all mail
- Streamlined calendar interface
- Sort contacts by first or last name
- Initiate a FaceTime call or SMS from a contact record

Various bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and enhancements.

• Enhancements and fixes
• The call directory information (Callkit) will not be available for China users
• The Calendar week view is now available on phones

• Bug fixes and enhancements
• Updated MaaS360 SDK
• Fix for Verse Caller ID
• Performance Improvements
• Quick scroll to top or Mail
• People and Actions list with second tap on associated tab

• Calendar Search
• Add Attachments from other Apps
• Add/Edit Calendar Alarms
• Mailbox view search that include results from all folders
• Button to select all items in a folder
• Prompt for confirmation when a Verse contact is deleted fr

• Bug fixes and improvements
• Fixed OS 12 hang when selecting addressees from Contact list
• Fix for IBM Connections links opening MDM secure browser rather than Connections App

• New performance setting for turning off contact photos in mailboxes.

• New performance option for mail optimization
• Updated MaaS360 support
